author: CBS News
title: 10-year-old gets birthday surprise while sheltering at home
description: "This is no emergency. This is all about having a good time," the boy's father said as firefighters and police officers dropped off presents.
content:
A 10-year-old boy who was missing out on birthday festivities due to the COVID-19 crisis got his spirits boosted Tuesday when the San Francisco Fire Department paid a special visit to his home, CBS San Francisco reports.
Tim Healy and his wife Robin Lim-Heal… [+2129 chars]
